${ModID}:FlameBlast.NAME: Flame Blast
${ModID}:FlameBlast.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Ignite. NL If the enemy has Vulnerable, apply !M! ${ModID}:Ignite again. NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:IceWall.NAME: Ice Wall
${ModID}:IceWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !B! Block next turn. NL Add a Dazed to the top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:FreezeAndBurn.NAME: Freeze and Burn
${ModID}:FreezeAndBurn.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Next turn, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Frostfire.NAME: Frostfire
${ModID}:Frostfire.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Ignite and !${ModID}:m2! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FieryMantle.NAME: Fiery Mantle
${ModID}:FieryMantle.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply !M! ${ModID}:Ignite.

${ModID}:SnowMelt.NAME: Snow Melt
${ModID}:SnowMelt.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional cards.
${ModID}:SnowMelt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional cards.

${ModID}:Pyromastery.NAME: Pyromastery
${ModID}:Pyromastery.DESCRIPTION: When you apply ${ModID}:Ignite, apply an additional !M! ${ModID}:Ignite.

${ModID}:ReadTheFlames.NAME: Read the Flames
${ModID}:ReadTheFlames.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Scry !${ModID}:m2!. NL Shuffle a *Fading *Ember into your draw pile.

${ModID}:FueledByEmbers.NAME: Fueled by Embers
${ModID}:FueledByEmbers.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! card and add !M! *Fading *Ember to your hand and draw pile.
${ModID}:FueledByEmbers.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! card and add !M! *Fading *Ember to your hand and draw pile.
